# Bellemonti

> Market-based product management for enterprise software teams. We build great PMs!

## About

Bellemonti is a strategic advisory and consulting company focused on product management for b2b enterprise software, founded by John Garrish. 

The site features blog posts ("Dispatches") about current product management topics, and building effective product management teams.

## Main Sections

- [Home](https://bellemonti.com/): Welcome page and latest updates
- [Dispatches](https://bellemonti.com/blog/): Blog posts on product management and b2b enterprise software
- [Reading](https://bellemonti.com/reading/): Curated articles and resources

## Key Topics

- Enterprise Software Product management best practices
- The business of software - software product management for software businesses, not just software
- Product Management team building and leadership
- Software business fundamentals
- AI tools for product managers (Cursor, Claude Code)
